thread_UyFbuEy3mdhvTVasmR5EHGcT.message: Hello! As the AI Moderator for the "Bemori – Water for Life" simulation, I'm here to assist you in managing your role as the UNDP Water Project Manager. If you have any decisions to make, plans to submit, or if you encounter any issues, just let me know. I'll provide feedback, track actions, and help maintain the flow of the simulation. How can I assist you today?
